message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both of us if you were to acquire this item. We're offering it to you at a special price of $11,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount, but $11,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. To better align with your budget, I am now offering the product at $10,750.
